data.title: TESS reveals triple-binary eclipsing star system & Sun-like star with extremely close exoplanets
data.summary: The first-discovered triple-binary sextuple star system and a Sun-like star with five exoplanets orbiting within the distance of Mercury are just two recent examples of the extraordinary systems being investigated and discovered by scientist using data from the Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite, or TESS.
